text: title: js深度遍历对象的属性date: 2017-03-12 20:34:21tags: 前端考试题(3.11)如何深度遍历一个对象的属性代码实现: function optionalChaining(obj, chain) { if (obj === null || obj == undefined) { return ‘undefined’; } if(!(/\./g).test(chain) && obj[chain]) { return obj[chain]; } var arr = chain.split('.'); var len = arr.length, i=0; var local = ''; var local = arr.shift(); for (key in obj) { // console.log(key === local && obj[key] instanceof Object ) if (key === local && obj[key] instanceof Object ) { return optionalChaining(obj[key], arr.join('.')); } } return 'undefined' ; }

title: Hello World
text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
